attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248729. **ALL NEW 2022 HONDA BR-V ELEGANCE**

**17” BLACK ALLOY WHEELS**
**LEATHER SEATS**
**HONDA SENSING® DRIVER-ASSISTANT TECHNOLOGY**
**6 SPEAKER SOUND SYSTEM**
**AUTO HEADLIGHTS WITH AUTO HIGH-BEAM**
**LANEWATCH™ BLIND SPOT CAMERA**

**WARRANTY 5 YEARS / 200,000KM**
**SERVICE PLAN 4 YEARS / 60,000KM**
**AA ROADSIDE ASSISTANCE 3 YEARS**

TOUGH
YET GRACEFUL
The All-New BR-V design presents a dynamic body shape with strong
contour lines that run along the body to accentuate the length of the new model. A design that is dominating, yet elegant. The front end has been redesigned to incorporate an aggressive, sporty new grille that seamlessly flows into the LED Daytime Running Lights and headlamps, giving the new model a confident appearance.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239074. Many car journalists call the Tiguan the complete car! With excellent build quality, drive feel and features its fair to say that it is excellent value for money!

The exterior features due to the R line kit are LED lights, chrome trim, mag wheels, diffuser and so much more bits and pieces for an aggresive look.

Interior features are a sunroof, premium Dyna audio sound system, memory set seats, cruise control, infotainment system with all the bells and whistles such as sat nav, voice recognition etc. Reverse camera, triptronic gearbox, configurable drive modes, heated seats, rear seat trays and so much more!

A TRUE BEAUTY!
ENQUIRE NOW!
